level.text: Applicants for a certificate of domestic partnership shall provide proof of mutual residence by supplying one (1) of the following documents:
A current lease or rental agreement for residential property that names both applicants as occupants of the premises named in the lease or rental agreement;
A mortgage for residential property that names both applicants as mortgagors;
A deed for residential property that states that both applicants share title to the premises named in the deed;
Utility bills for residential property that name both persons as being responsible for payment of the utility fees for the same address; or
An affidavit executed within the previous six (6) months in which the parties each state under penalty of perjury that both domestic partners share the same residence.
